explanation: The stage direction describes the setting of the scene, detailing the luxurious room in the brigands' lair and mentioning specific objects and accessories present in the room. This fits the definition of 'setting' which is stage description or play location.
stgdir: La plus belle chambre du repaire des brigands klephtes. - Luxe à volonté. Accessoires indispensables : un lit et un secrétaire quelconques. Une panoplie et quelques siéges. - Au mur pend un tube acoustique.
